channel.title: Out door game - deathlock
channel.description:
Have fun! STILL UNDER CONSTRUCTION NO SPAMMING NO FLAMMING
[br][size=1]Posted at: November 04, 2006, 06:43:41 PM[/size][hr]Rules of Death Lock 1. No cheats 2. No auto demanding 3. Follow owner- it means by listening to owner, has the right to kick you out of the game, but they cant kick you out for a dumb reason 4. you can choose to be evil.
1. Instructions- Legend: someone bring the game to group = Admin 2. someone bring the game to group 3. the Admin decides new quests and starts out at lv30 4. all other players are lv1 5. you can make special players also. 6. each player can have the own cool ability. 7. be creative too. For an example- I like cloning and dark evil abilitys and fire. 8. kill monsters to gain lvls 9. some monsters drop items 10. you can earn some abilitys but you start out with 1. Ranks/levels/requirments-1. Best .7 worst. 1. Admin- brings the game to group 2. Asst. Admin- friends or lv80 3. Mod- lv70-lv79, honest player 4. Member lv40-lv29 5. Novice player lv25-lv39 6. Beginner lv10-24 7. Newbie lv1-9
Monsters exp group what level of men health attack rank 1-**** 1. Dragon- 1000xp yes group 4 lv100s 1000hp 500atk 2. Trolls- 950xp yes 3 lv100s 950hp 450atk 3. High Knight- 800xp no/yes 1 lv75 750hp 350atk 4. solder- 780exp no/yes lv70 600hp 320atk 5. archer- 720xp yes 2 lv60lvl60 900hp 290atk 6. stone knight- 2000xp yes 10 lv50 6,000hp 100atk 7. Griffon  500xp no lv40 550hp 70atk 8. tree- 200xp no lv30 400hp 50 atk 9. mugger-100xp no lv20 250hp 25atk 10. bull- 50xp no lv10 300hp 5atk 11. chicken 5xp no lv1 20hp 1atk 12. baby troll 120xp no lv10 7atk 13. Cyclopes 150xp no lv30 10atk 14. Baby dragon 30xp yes lv10 4atk 15. ghost 30-100xp no lv5- lv20 4-20atk 16. ghoul 10xp no lv9 3atk
levels of attacks of p2p. level attack 100 400 99 395 98 390 97 385 96 380 95-90 350 89-87 325 86-83 314 82-77 300 76-72 284 71-67 278 66-63 250 62-60 243 59-50 220 49-47 200 46-42 189 41-39 170 38-30 160 29 124 28 122 27 114 26-20 104 19 95 18 92 17 87 16 56 15-12 40 11-7 25 6-3 20 2-3 10
Abilitys- 1. Summoning 2. Dark flame 3. Gun skills 4. beast within 5. Light flame 6. light powers 7. dark powers 8. cloning 9. magic 10. combat 11. archery 12. death warlord 13. elements 14. fire 15. water 16. earth 17. air 18. gravity 19. bending 20. evil magic 21. light magic
Ranks of abilitys how much exp 1. S+ 1000xp 2. S 900xp 3. A 800xp 4. B 700xp 5. C 600xp 6. D 200xp 7. lv10 100xp 8. lv5 50xp 9. lv3 20xp 10. lvl2 10xp 11. lvl1 5xp 12. In training
Levels of starting out with- Admin (max.2) 70 Global Mod (Max.3) lv40 Member (max.100) lv10 Newbie (max. ********) lv1
Exp = levels starting from lv2 Lvl xp once reached lv2 ur xp changes to exp same with 3 etc.. 2 10xp 3 17xp 4 22xp 5 24xp 6 27xp 7 30xp 8 32xp 9 33xp 10 39xp 11 43xp 12 60xp 13 70xp 14 85xp 15 94xp 16 102xp 17 104xp 18 109xp 19 111xp 20 114xp 21 117xp 22 119xp 23 121xp 24 125xp 25 125xp 26 125xp 27 125xp 28 126xp 29 127xp 30 170xp 31 175xp 32 180xp 33 183xp 34 184xp 35 186xp 36 189xp 37 196xp 38 200xp 39 203xp 40 206xp 41 207xp 42 208xp 43 211xp 44 215xp 45 300xp 46 340xp 47 380xp 48 420xp 49 467xp 50 503xp 51 507xp 52 530xp 53 542xp 54 576xp 55 586xp 56 599xp 57 600xp 58 630xp 59 690xp 60 750xp 61 880xp 62 886xp 63 889xp 64 935xp 65 937xp 66 999xp 67 1000xp 68 1005xp 69 1007xp 70 1010xp 71 1015xp 72 1018xp 73 1032xp 74 1042xp 75 1100xp 76 1123xp 77 1157xp 78 1160xp 79 1164xp 80 1166xp 81 1169xp 82 1173xp 83 1176xp 84 1180xp 85 1183xp 86 1184xp 87 1200xp 88 1250xp 89 1400xp 90 1500xp 91 1550xp 92 1554xp 93 1563xp 94 1800xp 95 1900xp 96 2000xp 97 2200cp 98 2300xp 99 2900xp 100  10,000 or get a total of 300,000xp Defence lvls Levels defence points 10 1 11 2 12 3 13 4 14 5 15 6 16 7 17 8 18 9 19 10 20 11 21 12 22 13 23 14 24 15 25 16 26 17 27 18 28 19 29 20 30 21 31 22 32 23 33 24 34 25 35 26 36 27 37 28 38 29 39 30 40 31 41 32 42 33 43 34 44 35 45 36 46 37 47 38 48 39 49 40 50 50 51 51 52 52 53 53 54 54 55 55 56 56 57 57 58 58 59 59 60 60 61 61 62 62 63 63 64 64 65 65 66 66 67 67 68 68 69 69 70 70 Defence points cut your enemys attack points

item.title: Out door game - deathlock
item.dc:creator: @up-java up-java
item.description:
@up-java wrote:

Have fun!
STILL UNDER CONSTRUCTION
NO SPAMMING
NO FLAMMING

[br][size=1]Posted at: November 04, 2006, 06:43:41 PM[/size][hr]Rules of Death Lock

  1. No cheats

  2. No auto demanding

  3. Follow owner- it means by listening to owner, has the right to kick you out of the game, but they cant kick you out for a dumb reason

  4. you can choose to be evil.

  5. Instructions- Legend: someone bring the game to group
    = Admin

  6. someone bring the game to group

  7. the Admin decides new quests and starts out at lv30

  8. all other players are lv1

  9. you can make special players also.

  10. each player can have the own cool ability.

  11. be creative too. For an example- I like cloning and dark evil abilitys and fire.

  12. kill monsters to gain lvls

  13. some monsters drop items

  14. you can earn some abilitys but you start out with 1.
    Ranks/levels/requirments-1. Best .7 worst.

  15. Admin- brings the game to group

  16. Asst. Admin- friends or lv80

  17. Mod- lv70-lv79, honest player

  18. Member lv40-lv29

  19. Novice player lv25-lv39

  20. Beginner lv10-24

  21. Newbie lv1-9

Monsters exp group what level of men health attack rank 1-****

  1. Dragon- 1000xp yes group 4 lv100s 1000hp 500atk
  2. Trolls- 950xp yes 3 lv100s 950hp 450atk
  3. High Knight- 800xp no/yes 1 lv75 750hp 350atk
  4. solder- 780exp no/yes lv70 600hp 320atk
  5. archer- 720xp yes 2 lv60lvl60 900hp 290atk
  6. stone knight- 2000xp yes 10 lv50 6,000hp 100atk
  7. Griffon  500xp no lv40 550hp 70atk
  8. tree- 200xp no lv30 400hp 50 atk
  9. mugger-100xp no lv20 250hp 25atk
  10. bull- 50xp no lv10 300hp 5atk
  11. chicken 5xp no lv1 20hp 1atk
  12. baby troll 120xp no lv10 7atk
  13. Cyclopes 150xp no lv30 10atk
  14. Baby dragon 30xp yes lv10 4atk
  15. ghost 30-100xp no lv5- lv20 4-20atk
  16. ghoul 10xp no lv9 3atk
